ItemTooltips.blink: This will help improve your initiation by many folds if needed. With Aghanim's, you won't be as necessary, if you can't reach Aghanim's, Blink Dagger is a quick-fix.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Mekansm gives the pushing power that Beastmaster loves and keeps his team safe and sound in team-fights.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: As a pusher and team-fighter, Vladmir's Offering suits the auras your team likes and desires early in the game.
ItemTooltips.pipe: If no other support is getting it, pick this up as well.
ItemTooltips.necronomicon: For further crowd-control, damage and stats gain: Necromonicon is right up Beastmaster's alley. The extra attack speed helps everyone on his team and in his arsenal (Boar)
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Aghanim's Scepter on Beastmaster improves his ultimate stupendously. It improves range and cooldown to an acceptable level that really makes it potent in team-fights.
ItemTooltips.assault: If not initiating, keep up the auras and damage-dealing with Assault Cuirass.
ItemTooltips.heart: Beastmaster can be an incredible tank with Heart of Tarrasque. In combination with Shiva's Guard, Beastmaster becomes nearly unkillable a mean presence in fights.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: With Beastmaster deep in battle and using his Boar to slow foes: Shiva's Guard would only heighten his presence and tankiness.
ItemTooltips.crimson_guard: Crimson Guard is your team-fighting ability to provide further survivability with your team.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Be able to cast Mekansm and your abilities freely with Arcane Boots.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Drums of Endurance is an early-game item that gives Beastmaster more mana, survivability and attack speed to gank foes with his ultimate.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: Shut down physical carries with this item.

AbilityTooltips.beastmaster_wild_axes: Enemies can be hit twice with this attack. However each axe must touch the target. Use it for its range, to tear down trees and deal huge damage in team-fights.
AbilityTooltips.beastmaster_call_of_the_wild: Use the Hawk to scout for ganks, runes and areas you want to gank. It cannot be seen at its max level if kept still and is a great to tool to keep your allies aware of their surroundings.
AbilityTooltips.beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar: The Boar has an incredible slow that really keep foes at bay. Use it to target fleeing enemies or to diminish physical carry's attack speed.
AbilityTooltips.beastmaster_inner_beast: Great effect to help ally physical carries deal faster damage. We max it last due to Beastmaster's more appealing capabilities.
AbilityTooltips.beastmaster_primal_roar: This is a unit-target. You must target a specific unit for this ability to work. Try and target an enemy at an angle that affects the most enemy heroes.
